email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Hope this message finds you well.

We have a vessel available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The vessel, MV OCEAN WAVE, has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 250m. The laycan is 25-30 September.

Freight rate is offered at $22/MT on CIF terms. Demurrage is set at $20,000 per day.

Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Can you revise the freight rate to $20/MT? Also, could you confirm the vessel's draft and any additional port charges?

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Blue Horizon Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. The vessel's draft is 16.5m. Port charges are estimated at $50,000, which are included in the CIF terms.

We can adjust the freight rate to $21/MT, but this is our best offer. Let us know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

$21/MT is acceptable. Can you confirm the laycan and provide the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Blue Horizon Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Laycan is confirmed for 25-30 September. Demurrage rate is $20,000 per day.

Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

We accept the terms. Please proceed with the booking and send us the final documents.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Blue Horizon Chartering
